titles.title: Tornado Family Safety Act of 2015
To amend the Small Business Act to allow the use of physical damage disaster loans for the construction of safe rooms, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
5/18/2015--Introduced. Tornado Family Safety Act of 2015
This bill amends the Small Business Act to allow Small Business Administration physical disaster loans to be used for the construction of safe rooms or similar storm shelters designed to protect property and occupants from tornadoes or other natural disasters.
